titleStmt.title: Siniorragia the sifters sieve broken, or a reply to Doctor Boughen's sifting my case of conscience touching the Kings coronation oath : wherein is cleared that bishops are not jure divino, that their sole government without the help of presbyters is an ursurpation and an innovation, that the Kings oath at coronation is not to be extended to preserve bishops, with the ruine of himself and kingdome / by John Geree.
titleStmt.author: Geree, John, 1601?-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
